Death Melody.effect: Units with Dark element ignore 7% DEF of targets when attacking.

Midnight Wither.effect: Units with Dark element ignore 11% DEF of targets and have 10% chance to make them in Dark status when attacking.

Light Surround.effect: Units with Light element have 8% chance to cast a shield (10% self Max HP) for 5 sec when being attacked.

Vortext.effect: Units with Dark and Light element have 8% change to make targets silent for 4 sec when attacking.

Rapid Winnd.effect: Units with Wind element have ATK SPD +8%

Hurricane Rage.effect: All units have ATK SPD +8% and units with Wind element have extra CRT +6%

Quick Flame.effect: Units with Fire element have ATK and MATK +8%

Energy Flame.effect: Units with Fire element have ATK and MATK +12% and Life steal effect +10% when attacking

Forest Song.effect: Units with Earth element have DEF +8% and DEF +100

Earth Shield.effect: Units with Earth element have DEF +8%, MDEF +8% and DEF +100, MDEF +200

Healing Tides.effect: All units have Max HP +9% and recover self HP (0.3% MAX HP) every sec.

Holy Prayer.effect: Units with Light element case shield (15% Max HP, 8 sec) when battle starts. All units have 8% chance to case shield (10% Max HP, 5 sec) when being attacked.

Doomdays.effect: All units in lineup have CRT +8% and CRT DMG +30%.

Skyfall God.effect: Initial MP +3 And MP Recovery Speed +15% when battle starts.
